data.message: Eminem, you'll probably never read this but I just want to thank you for ur music, the powerful words that shock my soul and remind me to keep going. I've been clean from dope for four years now and every cd every fuckin song lyric kept me going. I listen to u everyday and everyday I struggle n I tel myself "lindsay stop being a fuck pussbag n man up" I throw on headphones and I may stumble but I won't crumble.  Thank you eminem from the bottom of my heart thank you.
